me.pavva.pokejava

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pavva.pokejava.Move

  • public class Move
extends Object
    me.pavva.pokejava.Move A class which contains a Move constuctor, the get-set methods for the associated variables, and the Damage Calculator. The Damage Calulator uses methods in me.pavva.pokejava.Type
    See Also:
    App, Type, Pokemon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Move

        public Move(String name,
            Type type,
            int power,
            int points)
        Constructor for a Move Object. The power and points values are taken from Bulbapedia and Smogon Pokedex
        Parameters:
        name - A String which is the textual representation of the Move to the user.
        type - A Type from Type which Moves and Pokemon use for consistency.
        power - An int which represents the power of the Move.
        points - An int which represents the Power Points (PP) of the move. Power Points determine how many times a move can be used. This feature is not created yet.

    • Method Detail

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints(int points)
        Sets the new number of Power Points of the Move.
        Parameters:
        points - The int number of Power Points of the Move.

      • getPower

        Returns the power of the Move.
        Returns:
        The int power of the Move.

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Returns the number of Power Points of the Move.
        Returns:
        The int number of Power Points of the Move.

      • attack

        public static void attack(Pokemon attacker,
                          Pokemon defender,
                          Move attackerMove)
        The main Damage Calculator of the PokeJava program. This method is vital in setting the changing values of health of the Pokemon throught the game. It uses doStabCheck method and doEffectCheck method to realistically change the values of the health of the Pokemon.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The Pokemon which is attacking. Its attack value is used in determining the damage done.
        defender - The Pokemon which is receiving damage. Its defense value is used in determing the damage done. Its health value is changed at the end of the method
        attackerMove - The Move which the attacking Pokemon is using. Its power and type are used to determine the damage, STAB, and effectivity.
